results.title: Subcutaneous administration of lactone form of simvastatin stimulates ectopic osteoinduction by rhBMP-2.
results.text_hl: Subcutaneous administration of @CHEMICAL_Lactones @CHEMICAL_MESH:D007783 @@@lactone@@@ form of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ stimulates @<m>DISEASE_Hypothyroidism_Congenital_Nongoitrous_2</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C566852 @@@ectopic osteoinduction@@@ by rhBMP-2.

citations.NLM: Sugiyama T, Nakagawa T, Sato C, Fujii T, Mine K, Shimizu K, Murata T, Tagawa T. Subcutaneous administration of lactone form of simvastatin stimulates ectopic osteoinduction by rhBMP-2. Oral Dis. 2007 Mar;13(2):228-33. PMID: 17305627

results.title: Effects of High-Dose Simvastatin Therapy on Glucose Metabolism and Ectopic Lipid Deposition in Nonobese Type 2 Diabetic Patients
results.text_hl: CONCLUSIONS:High-dose @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ treatment has no direct effects on whole-body or tissue-specific @GENE_INS @GENE_3630 @@@insulin@@@ action and @<m>DISEASE_Hypothyroidism_Congenital_Nongoitrous_2</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C566852 @@@ectopic@@@ @CHEMICAL_Lipids @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008055 @@@lipid@@@ deposition.

citations.NLM: Szendroedi J, Anderwald C, Krssak M, Bayerle-Eder M, Esterbauer H, Pfeiler G, Brehm A, Nowotny P, Hofer A, Waldhäusl W, Roden M. Effects of High-Dose Simvastatin Therapy on Glucose Metabolism and Ectopic Lipid Deposition in Nonobese Type 2 Diabetic Patients  Diabetes Care. 2009 Feb;32(2):209-14. PMID: 18957532

results.title: Effects of simvastatin on retinoic acid system in primary human endometrial stromal cells and in a chimeric model of human endometriosis.
results.text_hl: Similarly, @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ treatment of nude @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@ bearing @SPECIES_9606 @@@human@@@ @DISEASE_Uterine_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D014591 @@@endometrial xenografts@@@ led to an increased expression of @GENE_CRABP2 @GENE_1382 @@@CRABP2@@@ and @GENE_STRA6 @GENE_64220 @@@STRA6@@@ proteins in @<m>DISEASE_Hypothyroidism_Congenital_Nongoitrous_2</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C566852 @@@ectopic lesions@@@.

citations.NLM: Sokalska A, Anderson M, Villanueva J, Ortega I, Bruner-Tran KL, Osteen KG, Duleba AJ. Effects of simvastatin on retinoic acid system in primary human endometrial stromal cells and in a chimeric model of human endometriosis. J Clin Endocrinol Metab. 2013 Mar;98(3):E463-71. PMID: 23337719

results.title: [Changes of fatty acids spectrum of plasma triglycerides and their pharmacological correction by statins in patients with unstable angina].
results.text_hl: High therapeutic effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Atorvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069059 @@@atorvastatin@@@ may be due to the identified strong correlation between the dynamics of the @CHEMICAL_Fatty_Acids @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005227 @@@fatty acid@@@ components of plasma @CHEMICAL_Triglycerides @CHEMICAL_MESH:D014280 @@@triglycerides@@@ and indicators of @DISEASE_Ischemia @DISEASE_MESH:D007511 @@@ischemia@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Hypothyroidism_Congenital_Nongoitrous_2</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C566852 @@@ectopic activity@@@ in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with progressive @DISEASE_Angina_Pectoris @DISEASE_MESH:D000787 @@@angina@@@.

citations.NLM: Lyzohub VH, Artemchuk OO, Dolynna OV, Altunina NV, Sharaieva ML, Koniuk TN. [Changes of fatty acids spectrum of plasma triglycerides and their pharmacological correction by statins in patients with unstable angina]. Lik Sprava. 2013 Apr-May;(3):11-5. PMID: 25016741
